features.title: As smooth as git
features.description: Kiwi uses git as its base, so you get all the benefits of the git workflow; branches, permissioning, pull requests and more

features.title: Built on MDX
features.description: By using MDX, Kiwi allows you to express yourself fully, not limited by the features of your wiki provider

features.title: Inspired documentation
features.description: We encourage readers to contribute at every turn; gone are the days of forcing developers to document!

features.title: Integrated workflow
features.description: Kiwi hooks into slack, email and others to make sure you get updates to pages you care about where you want

features.title: Beautiful, your way
features.description: Kiwi has a gorgeous base style, but you can make it look however you like with our easy-to-use theming system

features.title: Your wiki, your data
features.description: We don't want you locked in; we promise to allow you to export data in actually readable formats to import wherever you want
